ygData.subject: Re: Searching in OOT, just sharks so far...
ygData.msgSnippet: The sunken ship you refer too is not in it s own zone.  It s in Erud s Crossing and spawns zombie sailors.  One of them drops the blurred map used for a
ygData.messageBody:
The sunken ship you refer too is not in it's own zone. It's in Erud's
Crossing and spawns zombie sailors. One of them drops the "blurred map"
used for a quest. None of them drop any tinkering info, nor is there a
book anywhere on the ship as I have thoroughly serached it.

Quasinom de Plume
{Mith Marr Server}

--- kale eusi <kaleusi@...> wrote:
> >From: FizzBan <sragan@...>
> >
> >
> >The shark I found was due south of the 'sisters' isle and conned green
> to
> >me at 34. Its probably in the mid to high 20's. It didnt attack me.
> >
> >That was the only monster I found underwater so far, except perhaps for
> a
> >few wading cyclops =).
> >
> >"FizzWizz" of tunare
> >
>
> I've managed to piece this together from a lot of rumors... for all of
> you
> out there with a Fishbone Earring or such.... go to the sisters isle in
> OOT.... have someone find the dwarves at the forge (located on the isle)
> and
> click on one of the bags located there (heard one is a secret button)...
> you
> should hear a grating noise... the person with the earring should search
>
> under the water for an open secret passage that should be open now...
>
> Also, I heard there's a sunken ship somewhere possibly within the OOT or
>
> Erud's Crossing that is it's own zone. Perhaps one of these suggestions
> is
> what we seek?
>
> Again - I based all this off of various rumors I heard and pieced
> together,
> plus the clue "search under the waves".
>
<HR>
<html>
>


=====
